message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $750,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value is $800,000 to you. What do you think?

I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $680,000. I believe it's a good price considering the product's value to me is $800,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $680,000. What do you think?
